[bq="trashboat"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cdbd516368721157b90100#post_53cdbd516368721157b90100
He kind of is.[/bq]
Not really; Levi in a single mission has all of his friends that he's known for years killed in a failed mission that he can't even retrieve their bodies for a funeral and has to recruit a bunch of wet behind the ears rookies to replace them cause of a traitor in their midst who thought playing yo-yo with his friends was fun.  Anakin just constantly whines about his feelings(tm) and how "tough" his life is when the council constantly rains him with praise about a half baked prophecy that predicts he will be the jedi messiah.
